sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
To the honourable knights, citizens, and burgesses, of the Commons House of Parliament the humble petition as well, of diuers merchants and citizens of London that vse buying and selling of fustians made in England, as of the makers of the same fustians.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
s.n., [London : 1621?]
Requesting that fustians not be subject to export taxes as the raw materials employed in their manufacture are taxed on importation--STC. Imprint from STC. Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library, London, England.
=======

s.n., [London : 1621?]
Requesting that fustians not be subject to export taxes as the raw materials employed in their manufacture are taxed on importation--STC. Imprint from STC. Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library, London, England.
